column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////We are regulars. We used to love this place. I guess management has changed or some significant cost cutting is taking place. Since our last three visits
column2: we noticed they have cut down on sauces. Barely any hollandaise on your Benedicts and non-existent Mascarpone on your pancakes. Even if you ask for extra
column3: they give you this super small sauce cups. This is exactly how excellent establishments drive away their loyal customers and then eventually shut down. I don't know - we may give them one more try before calling it quits.
